title: Custom Match History
body: I played a custom 1v1 with a guy and said I'd gift him a mystery skin if he won, which he did. But now i cant find him because we both left and didnt destroy the nexus! Any way I could get some help finding him?

replies.body: Eeeeee I can't give that out for security reasons, but if it was a custom game you must have had some interaction with them outside of the game first yea? Hopefully you can track them down again from chat messages or something like that!
